tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quantum_experiment_progress (
  experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  experiment_date DATE,
  communication_type TEXT,
  success BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE experiment_data (
    experiment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    experiment_date DATE,
    communication_method VARCHAR(50),
    success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE experiment_results (
    result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    result_data VARCHAR(255),
    result_code INTEGER,
    result_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiment_data(experiment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE communication_data (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT,
    sender VARCHAR(100),
    receiver VARCHAR(100),
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE participant_details (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT,
    participant_name VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE measurements (
  measurement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INTEGER REFERENCES experiments(experiment_id),
  participant_id INTEGER REFERENCES participants(participant_id),
  measurement_data JSON,
  measurement_date TIMESTAMP
);
